title: 1972–73 Hellenic Football League
text:
The 1972–73 Hellenic Football League season was the 20th in the history of the <a href="Hellenic%20Football%20League">Hellenic Football League</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition in England.
Premier Division.
The Premier Division featured 15 clubs which competed in the division last season, along with two new clubs:
Division One.
The Division One featured 16 clubs, including 14 clubs from the previous season's <a href="1971%E2%80%9372%20Hellenic%20Football%20League%23Division%20One%20A">Division One A</a> and <a href="1971%E2%80%9372%20Hellenic%20Football%20League%23Division%20One%20B">Division One B</a> and 2 clubs relegated from the Premier Division: 
Clubs relegated from the Premier Division:
Clubs transferred from Division One A:
Clubs transferred from Division One B:
Division Two.
The Division Two featured 11 clubs, including 8 clubs relegated from the previous season's <a href="1971%E2%80%9372%20Hellenic%20Football%20League%23Division%20One%20A">Division One A</a> and <a href="1971%E2%80%9372%20Hellenic%20Football%20League%23Division%20One%20B">Division One B</a> and 3 clubs joined Division Two: 
Clubs relegated from Division One A:
